categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Imperial Advisor Coh Veshiv was captured in 0 ABY by Rebel allied privateers at the planet Esseles. The Rebel affiliated crew led by Dhas Fenoep Vedij of the former Imperial EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate Far Orbit, managed to convince Veshiv that they were present to take him to his next destination. Veshiv agreed and left his ship, the Empire Forever, and was captured, being turned over to the Rebels eventualy. It was in large part due to Veshiv's capture as well as the failure to stop it that Palpatine orchestrated the Battle of Andalia, which resulted in Grand Admiral Osvald Teshik's cyborgification.
